analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They will not complete the perfection of perseverance.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They will not complete the perfection of concentration.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro //🔽nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro // nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They will not complete the perfection of wisdom.🔽They will not complete inner emptiness.

original: phyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They will not complete outer emptiness.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They will not complete inner and outer emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They will not complete the emptiness of emptiness.

original: chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They will not complete great emptiness.

original: don dam pa stong @222a *//🔽pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro //🔽'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: don dam pa stong @222a *// pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro // 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: the emptiness of the ultimate will not be perfected,🔽the emptiness of the conditioned will not be perfected,

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur to //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur to //
translated: the emptiness of the unconditioned will not be perfected,

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: the emptiness of what is beyond extremes will not be perfected,

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: the emptiness of the beginningless and endless will not be perfected,

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: the emptiness of non-rejection will not be perfected,

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: the emptiness of inherent existence will not be perfected,

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: the emptiness of all phenomena will not be perfected,

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: the emptiness of specific characteristics will not be perfected,

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: and the emptiness of non-apprehension will not be perfected.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro //🔽ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro // ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: the emptiness of non-apprehension,🔽the emptiness of essential nature,

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: the emptiness of the essential nature of non-existence,

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: the four applications of mindfulness,

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: the four right efforts,

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro //🔽dbang po rnams yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro // dbang po rnams yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: the four bases of magical power,🔽the five faculties,

original: stobs rnams yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: stobs rnams yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: the five powers,

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: the seven factors of awakening,

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs @222b su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs @222b su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: and the eightfold noble path.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: “They will not perfect the four noble truths.

original: bsam gtan rnams yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: the meditative stabilities will not be perfected,

original: tshad med pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: the immeasurable aspirations will not be perfected,

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: the formless meditative absorptions will not be perfected,

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: the eight aspects of liberation will not be perfected,

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: the nine serial steps of meditative absorption will not be perfected,

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: the emptiness aspect of liberation, the signlessness aspect of liberation, and the aspirationlessness aspect of liberation will not be perfected,

original: mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: the [five] dominant faculties will not be perfected,🔽the [five] powers will not be perfected,

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: the [seven] branches of enlightenment will not be perfected,🔽the noble eightfold path will not be perfected,

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: the three gateways to liberation will not be perfected,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: the ten powers of the tathāgatas will not be perfected,

original: mi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: they will not perfect the four fearlessnesses;

original: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: they will not perfect the four detailed and thorough knowledges;

original: snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: they will not perfect great compassion;

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: they will not perfect the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.🔽They will not perfect the perfection of giving, the perfection of morality, the perfection of patience, the perfection of perseverance,

original: gang gis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ba dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ba dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ba dang /🔽brtson 'grus kyi pha @223a *//
analyzed: gang gis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ba dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ba dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ba dang /🔽brtson 'grus kyi pha @223a *//
translated: the perfection of concentration,

original: rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ba dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ba dang / nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ba dang /
analyzed: rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ba dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ba dang / nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ba dang /
translated: the perfection of generosity will not be completed, the perfection of discipline will not be completed, the perfection of patience will not be completed, the perfection of diligence will not be completed, the perfection of concentration will not be completed, the perfection of wisdom will not be completed, inner emptiness will not be completed,

original: phyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ba dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs bar mi 'gyur ba dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ba dang / chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ba dang /
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ba dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs bar mi 'gyur ba dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ba dang / chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ba dang /
translated: outer emptiness will not be completed, inner and outer emptiness will not be completed, the emptiness of emptiness will not be completed, the great emptiness will not be completed,

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ba dang / 'dus byas stong ba nyid yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ba dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ba dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs bar mi 'gyur ba dang /
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ba dang / 'dus byas stong ba nyid yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ba dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ba dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs bar mi 'gyur ba dang /
translated: the emptiness of ultimate reality would not be perfected, the emptiness of the conditioned would not be perfected, the emptiness of the unconditioned would not be perfected, the emptiness of what transcends limits would not be perfected,

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong ba nyid yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ba dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ba dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ba dang /
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong ba nyid yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ba dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ba dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ba dang /
translated: the emptiness of what is beginningless and endless would not be perfected, the emptiness of what is not to be discarded would not be perfected, the emptiness of inherent existence would not be perfected,

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ba dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ba dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ba dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par mi @223b 'gyur ba dang /
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ba dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ba dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ba dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par mi @223b 'gyur ba dang /
translated: the emptiness of all phenomena would not be perfected, the emptiness of its own mark would not be perfected, the emptiness of non-apprehension would not be perfected, the emptiness of non-things would not be perfected,

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ba dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ba dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ba dang /
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ba dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ba dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ba dang /
translated: the emptiness of essential nature would not be perfected, the emptiness of the essential nature of non-things would not be perfected, the applications of mindfulness would not be perfected,

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ba dang / dbang po rnams yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ba dang / stobs rnams yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ba dang /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ba dang / dbang po rnams yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ba dang / stobs rnams yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ba dang /
translated: the four right efforts would not be fully accomplished, the four legs of miraculous power would not be fully accomplished, the five faculties would not be fully accomplished, the five powers would not be fully accomplished,

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ba dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ba dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ba dang / bsam gtan rnams yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ba dang /
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ba dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ba dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ba dang / bsam gtan rnams yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ba dang /
translated: the seven aspects of enlightenment would not be fully accomplished, the noble eightfold path would not be fully accomplished, the noble truths would not be fully accomplished, the meditative concentrations would not be fully accomplished,

original: tshad med pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ba dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ba dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ba dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ba dang /
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ba dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ba dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ba dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ba dang /
translated: the immeasurables would not be perfected, the formless absorptions would not be perfected, the eight aspects of liberation would not be perfected, the nine serial steps of meditative absorption would not be perfected,

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ba dang / mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ba dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ba dang /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ba dang / mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ba dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ba dang /
translated: the emptiness aspect of liberation, the signless aspect of liberation, and the wishless aspect of liberation would not be perfected, the supernormal knowledges would not be perfected, the meditative stabilities would not be perfected,

original: gzungs @224a *// kyi sgo rnams yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ba dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ba dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ba dang /
analyzed: gzungs @224a *// kyi sgo rnams yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ba dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ba dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ba dang /
translated: the ten powers of the tathāgatas will not be perfected, the four fearlessnesses will not be perfected, the four detailed and thorough knowledges will not be perfected,

original: snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ba des ni /
analyzed: snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ba des ni /
translated: great compassion will not be perfected, and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha will not be perfected.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par mi 'gyur /
translated: “Because of that, a buddhafield will not be purified,

original: sems can rnams yongs su smin par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sems can rnams yongs su smin par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: and beings will not be brought to maturity.

original: gang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par ma gyur pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par ma gyur pa de ni /
analyzed: gang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par ma gyur pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par ma gyur pa de ni /
translated: “Whoever does not purify a buddhafield and does not bring beings to maturity

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: they will not fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: de ltar yongs su bsngo ba de ni /
analyzed: de ltar yongs su bsngo ba de ni /
translated: Because that dedication

original: dug dang bcas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dug dang bcas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: is poisoned.

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe 'di ltar yongs su brtag par bya ste /
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe 'di ltar yongs su brtag par bya ste /
translated: “Moreover, Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom should investigate as follows:

original: ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis chos nyid 'dis dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo bar bya ste /
analyzed: ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis chos nyid 'dis dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo bar bya ste /
translated: ‘Just as those lord buddhas have dedicated those wholesome roots with this reality,🔽so too I dedicate with that reality to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.’

original: de ltar yongs su bsngos na /
analyzed: de ltar yongs su bsngos na /
translated: When dedicated like that,

original: yongs su bsngos pa'i rab tu 'gyur ro //🔽zhes bya bar thugs su chud pa de bzhin du bdag gis kyang chos nyid des @224b bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar bya'o //
analyzed: yongs su bsngos pa'i rab tu 'gyur ro // zhes bya bar thugs su chud pa de bzhin du bdag gis kyang chos nyid des @224b bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar bya'o //
translated: it becomes a dedication.

original: zhes yongs su brtag par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes yongs su brtag par bya'o //
translated: ’ They should investigate like that.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la bka' stsal pa /🔽rab 'byor / legs so /
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la bka' stsal pa / rab 'byor / legs so /
translated: Then the Lord said to the venerable Subhuti:

original: legs so // rab 'byor /
analyzed: legs so // rab 'byor /
translated: Subhuti, good, good!

original: de ltar khyod byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba'i phung po mtshan ma med pa'i tshul dang / dmigs pa med pa'i tshul dang / skye ba med pa'i tshul dang / 'gag pa med pa'i tshul dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i tshul dang /
analyzed: de ltar khyod byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba'i phung po mtshan ma med pa'i tshul dang / dmigs pa med pa'i tshul dang / skye ba med pa'i tshul dang / 'gag pa med pa'i tshul dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i tshul dang /
translated: Subhuti, it is good that you teach the Bodhisattvas, the great beings, the heap of merit of the dedication, in the manner of signlessness, in the manner of objectlessness, in the manner of nonproduction, in the manner of nonstopping, in the manner of nondefilement,

original: rnam par byang ba med pa'i tshul dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi tshul dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi tshul dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul dang / de bzhin nyid kyi tshul dang /
analyzed: rnam par byang ba med pa'i tshul dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi tshul dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi tshul dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul dang / de bzhin nyid kyi tshul dang /
translated: in the manner of nonpurification, in the manner of the nature of nonexistence, in the manner of the emptiness of own-marks, in the manner of the emptiness of own-being, in the manner of the dharma-element, in the manner of suchness,

original: gzhan ma yin pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi tshul gyis ston pa ni /

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po re re la'ang gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal stan dang / nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang / yo byad mang pos bskal pa gangga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du rim gror byas /🔽bkur stir byas /

translated: and all the sentient beings in all the world systems in the downward direction, as numerous as the sands of the Ganges River, would serve each bodhisattva mahāsattva with alms, bedding, medicine for the sick, and various necessities for eons equal to the sands of the Ganges River,🔽and would revere them,🔽honor them,

original: phu dud du byas /
analyzed: phu dud du byas /
translated: and make offerings to them,🔽and all the sentient beings in all the world systems in the upward direction, as numerous as the sands of the Ganges River, would serve each bodhisattva mahāsattva with alms, bedding, medicine for the sick, and various necessities for eons equal to the sands of the Ganges River,🔽and would revere them,🔽honor them,

original: mchod par byas te /
analyzed: mchod par byas te /
translated: and make offerings to them.

original: bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas pa dang / shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangga'i klung gi bye ma snyed na sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po re re la'ang gos dang /
analyzed: bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas pa dang / shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangga'i klung gi bye ma snyed na sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po re re la'ang gos dang /
translated: and all the things that bring happiness, and all the sentient beings in all the world systems in the south, as many as there are, were to honor each bodhisattva mahāsattva with robes,

original: bsod snyoms dang / mal stan dang / nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang / yo byad mang pos bskal pa gangga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du rim gror byas /
analyzed: bsod snyoms dang / mal stan dang / nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang / yo byad mang pos bskal pa gangga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du rim gror byas /
translated: food, bedding, seats, medicine to cure the ill, and all the necessities, and were to serve them in this way for aeons equal to the number of grains of sand in the Ganges river,

original: bkur stir byas /🔽phu dud du byas /
analyzed: bkur stir byas / phu dud du byas /
translated: honoring them,

original: mchod par byas te /
analyzed: mchod par byas te /
translated: revering them,🔽and worshipping them with all the things that bring happiness,

original: bde pa'i yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas pa dang / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangga'i klung gi bye ma snyed na sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po re re la'ang gos dang /
analyzed: bde pa'i yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas pa dang / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangga'i klung gi bye ma snyed na sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po re re la'ang gos dang /
translated: and all the sentient beings in all the world systems in the southwest, as many as there are, were to honor each bodhisattva mahāsattva with robes,

original: bsod snyoms dang / mal stan dang / nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang / yo byad mang pos bskal pa gangga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du rim gror byas /🔽bkur stir byas /
analyzed: bsod snyoms dang / mal stan dang / nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang / yo byad mang pos bskal pa gangga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du rim gror byas / bkur stir byas /
translated: They would serve them for eons equal to the sands of the Ganges River with alms, bedding, medicine for the sick, and various necessities.🔽They would honor them,

original: phu dud du byas /
analyzed: phu dud du byas /
translated: revere them,

original: mchod par byas te /
analyzed: mchod par byas te /
translated: and make offerings to them.🔽They would serve them with all the necessities of happiness.

original: bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur @227b byas pa dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangga'i klung gi bye ma snyed na sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po re re la'ang gos dang /
analyzed: bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur @227b byas pa dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangga'i klung gi bye ma snyed na sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po re re la'ang gos dang /
translated: “In the northwest, in as many worlds as there are sand particles in the Ganges River, all the sentient beings there would each serve a single bodhisattva-mahāsattva with robes,

original: bsod snyoms dang / mal stan dang / nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang / yo byad mang pos bskal pa gangga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du rim gror byas /🔽bkur stir byas /
analyzed: bsod snyoms dang / mal stan dang / nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang / yo byad mang pos bskal pa gangga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du rim gror byas / bkur stir byas /
translated: alms, bedding, medicine for the sick, and various necessities for eons equal to the sands of the Ganges River.🔽They would honor them,

original: phu dud du byas; mchod par byas te /
analyzed: phu dud du byas; mchod par byas te /
translated: revere them, and make offerings to them.

original: bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas pa dang / 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangga'i klung gi bye ma snyed na sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po re re la'ang gos dang /
analyzed: bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas pa dang / 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangga'i klung gi bye ma snyed na sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po re re la'ang gos dang /
translated: and all the articles for happiness, and all the sentient beings in the world systems in the ten directions, as many as there are in each of the world systems in the great trichiliocosm, were to honor each bodhisattva great being with robes,

original: bsod snyoms dang / mal stan dang / nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang / yo byad mang pos bskal pa gangga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du rim gror byas /
analyzed: bsod snyoms dang / mal stan dang / nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang / yo byad mang pos bskal pa gangga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du rim gror byas /
translated: alms, bedding, healing medicines, and supplies, and to serve them for eons equal to the number of grains of sand in the Ganges River,

original: bkur stir byas /🔽phu dud du byas /
analyzed: bkur stir byas / phu dud du byas /
translated: and to revere them,🔽to venerate them,

original: mchod par byas te /
analyzed: mchod par byas te /
translated: to worship them,

original: bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas pa dang / steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangga'i klung gi bye ma snyed na sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po re re la'ang gos dang /
analyzed: bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas pa dang / steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangga'i klung gi bye ma snyed na sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po re re la'ang gos dang /
translated: and to honor them with all the articles for happiness, and all the sentient beings in the world systems in the ten directions, as many as there are in each of the world systems in the great trichiliocosm, were to honor each bodhisattva great being with robes,🔽alms, bedding, healing medicines, and supplies, and to serve them for eons equal to the number of grains of sand in the Ganges River,

original: bsod snyoms dang / mal stan dang / nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang / yo byad mang pos bskal pa gangga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du rim gror byas /
analyzed: bsod snyoms dang / mal stan dang / nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang / yo byad mang pos bskal pa gangga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du rim gror byas /
translated: and with alms, clothing, bedding, medicine for the sick, and various necessities, for as many eons as there are grains of sand in the Ganges River,

original: bkur stir byas /🔽phu dud du byas /
analyzed: bkur stir byas / phu dud du byas /
translated: and honored them,🔽revered them,

original: mchod par byas te /🔽bde ba'i yo byad @228a *//
analyzed: mchod par byas te / bde ba'i yo byad @228a *//
translated: and made offerings to them,

original: thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas na /
analyzed: thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas na /
translated: and served them with all the necessities of happiness,

original: rab 'byor / de ji snyam du sems /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ji snyam du sems /
translated: what do you think, Subhūti?🔽Would those sons of a good family or daughters of a good family on that account have a lot of merit?”

original: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam; gsol pa /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam; gsol pa /
translated: “A lot,

original: bcom ldan 'das /🔽mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das / mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa /
translated: Blessed One!🔽A lot, Sugata!”

original: mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das /🔽tshad ma mchis /🔽grangs ma mchis /
analyzed: mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das / tshad ma mchis / grangs ma mchis /
translated: “Blessed One,🔽it is immeasurable,🔽incalculable,

original: dpag tu ma mchis te /
analyzed: dpag tu ma mchis te /
translated: and beyond measure.

original: bcom ldan 'das; bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po de'i dpe bgyi bar yang dka'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das; bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po de'i dpe bgyi bar yang dka'o //
translated: Blessed One, it is hard to make a simile for that thing that creates merit.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: gal te bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po de la gzugs mchis su lags na ni /
analyzed: gal te bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po de la gzugs mchis su lags na ni /
translated: if that thing that creates merit were to have a form,

original: 'jig rten gyi khams gangga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du'ang shod par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams gangga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du'ang shod par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: it would not be possible to describe it even in as many world systems as there are sand particles in the Ganges River.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /🔽rab 'byor / legs so /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa / rab 'byor / legs so /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: legs so // de de bzhin te /
analyzed: legs so // de de bzhin te /
translated: “Subhūti, excellent, excellent!

original: ji skad du smras pa de bzhin no //
analyzed: ji skad du smras pa de bzhin no //
translated: It is just so, just as you have said.

original: rab 'byor / de bas kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di chags pa med pa'i yongs su bsngo bas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba de ni /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de bas kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di chags pa med pa'i yongs su bsngo bas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba de ni /
translated: Subhūti, a son of good family or daughter of good family who dedicates the roots of virtue to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening with a dedication that is free of attachment

original: bsod nams ches mang du 'phel te /
analyzed: bsod nams ches mang du 'phel te /
translated: generates even more merit than that.

original: rab 'byor / de ltar na /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar na /
translated: Subhūti, in that way

original: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo da'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo ba de ni /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo da'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo ba de ni /
translated: the roots of virtue of that son of good family or daughter of good family who dedicates them

original: rab ces bya'o //
analyzed: rab ces bya'o //
translated: are called excellent,

original: gtso bo zhes bya'o //
analyzed: gtso bo zhes bya'o //
translated: are called foremost,

original: dam pa zhes bya'o //🔽phul zhes bya'o //🔽mchog ces bya'o //
analyzed: dam pa zhes bya'o // phul zhes bya'o // mchog ces bya'o //
translated: are called sublime,🔽are called preeminent,

original: gya nom pa zhes bya'o //🔽bla na med pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: gya nom pa zhes bya'o // bla na med pa zhes bya'o //
translated: are called supreme,🔽are called refined,🔽are called unsurpassed,

original: gong na med pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: gong na med pa zhes bya'o //
translated: and are called unequaled.

original: rab 'byor / @228b chags pa med pa'i yongs su bsngo ba 'di la dge ba'i rtsa ba snga ma des brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o //🔽stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / @228b chags pa med pa'i yongs su bsngo ba 'di la dge ba'i rtsa ba snga ma des brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o // stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o //
translated: Subhūti, that former wholesome root does not approach even a hundredth part of this unattached dedication.🔽It does not approach even a thousandth part.

original: brgya stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o //🔽bye ba brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o //
analyzed: brgya stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o // bye ba brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o //
translated: It does not approach even a hundred-thousandth part.🔽It does not approach even a ten-millionth part.

original: bye ba stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o //🔽bye ba brgya stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o //
analyzed: bye ba stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o // bye ba brgya stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o //
translated: It does not approach even a hundred-millionth part.🔽It does not approach even a billionth part.

original: bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o //
analyzed: bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o //
translated: It does not approach even a ten-billionth part.

original: grangs dang / cha dang / bgrang ba dang / dpe dang / rgyur yang mi bzod do //
analyzed: grangs dang / cha dang / bgrang ba dang / dpe dang / rgyur yang mi bzod do //
translated: It does not stand up to any count, fraction, calculation, simile, or example.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why is that?

original: de ni / 'di ltar rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan par gyur pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan par gyur pa de dag ni /
analyzed: de ni / 'di ltar rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan par gyur pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan par gyur pa de dag ni /
translated: It is thus: those sons of enlightened heritage or daughters of enlightened heritage who are endowed with the ten positive actions, the four meditative states, the four immeasurable aspirations, the four formless states of composure, and the five kinds of supernormal knowledge,

original: dmigs pa'i 'du shas can no //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i 'du shas can no //
translated: they are conceptualized as objects.

original: de ltar sems can thams cad rgyun du zhugs par gyur pa dang / sems can thams cad lan gcig phyir 'ong bar gyur pa dang / sems can thams cad phyir mi 'ong bar gyur pa dang / sems can thams cad dgra bcom par gyur pa dang /
analyzed: de ltar sems can thams cad rgyun du zhugs par gyur pa dang / sems can thams cad lan gcig phyir 'ong bar gyur pa dang / sems can thams cad phyir mi 'ong bar gyur pa dang / sems can thams cad dgra bcom par gyur pa dang /
translated: In the same way, when all sentient beings have become stream enterers, when all sentient beings have become once-returners, when all sentient beings have become nonreturners, when all sentient beings have become arhats,

original: sems can thams cad rang sangs rgyas su gyur pa de dag la gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal stan dang / nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang / yo byad mang pos rim gror byed /🔽bkur stir byed /
analyzed: sems can thams cad rang sangs rgyas su gyur pa de dag la gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal stan dang / nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang / yo byad mang pos rim gror byed / bkur stir byed /
translated: when all sentient beings have become pratyekabuddhas, one should serve them with clothing, alms-food, bedding, a seat, and medicinal herbs and supplies used for treating the sick,🔽one should honor them,

original: phu dud du byed /
analyzed: phu dud du byed /
translated: one should respect them,

original: mchod par byed pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag kyang dmigs pa'i @229a *//
analyzed: mchod par byed pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag kyang dmigs pa'i @229a *//
translated: Those sons and daughters of good family who make offerings to them are also conceptual.

original: 'du shes can no //
analyzed: 'du shes can no //
translated: They have the perception of objects.

original: de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu stong phrag nyi shu dang 'grogs te thal mo sbyar nas dga' ba'i yid kyis bcom ldan 'das la phyag btsal te 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu stong phrag nyi shu dang 'grogs te thal mo sbyar nas dga' ba'i yid kyis bcom ldan 'das la phyag btsal te 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: Then the Four Great Kings, together with twenty thousand gods from the Heaven of the Four Kings, with palms joined, with joyful minds, bowed to the Blessed One and said this:

original: kye ma bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: kye ma bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Oh Blessed One!

original: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams thabs mkhas pas dmigs su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / chags pa ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / bgyid pa ma mchis pa'i tshul gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo zhing /
analyzed: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams thabs mkhas pas dmigs su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / chags pa ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / bgyid pa ma mchis pa'i tshul gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo zhing /
translated: In this way, the bodhisattva mahāsattvas, through skillful means, dedicate those wholesome roots to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening, using the method of non-apprehension, the method of non-attachment, the method of signlessness, and the method of non-action.

original: ci nas kyang gnyis su mi 'gyur ba dang / gnyis ma lags par yang mi 'gyur ba de ltar yongs su bsngo ba de ni /
analyzed: ci nas kyang gnyis su mi 'gyur ba dang / gnyis ma lags par yang mi 'gyur ba de ltar yongs su bsngo ba de ni /
translated: In such a way, they dedicate in such a way that it is not dual and not nondual.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba shin tu che'o //🔽de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin sum cu rtsa gsum gyi ris kyi lta'i bu stong phrag du ma dang 'grogs te lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi bdug spos dang / lha rdzas kyi phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba shin tu che'o // de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin sum cu rtsa gsum gyi ris kyi lta'i bu stong phrag du ma dang 'grogs te lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi bdug spos dang / lha rdzas kyi phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang /
translated: This is the bodhisattva great beings’ dedication that is very great.

original: lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan mang po thogs te lha rdzas kyi rol mo byed cing /
analyzed: lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan mang po thogs te lha rdzas kyi rol mo byed cing /
translated: Then Śatakratu, head of the gods, together with many thousands of sons of gods from the Heaven of the Thirty-Three, carrying divine flowers, incense, perfume, flower garlands, creams, powders, clothes, parasols, flags, and banners, and playing divine music,

original: lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi bdug spos dang / lha @229b rdzas kyi phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang /
analyzed: lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi bdug spos dang / lha @229b rdzas kyi phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang /
translated: divine ointments,🔽divine powders,🔽divine clothes,🔽divine parasols,🔽divine banners, and divine flags.

original: lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gtor to //🔽rab tu gtor to //
analyzed: lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gtor to // rab tu gtor to //
translated: They scattered them over the Blessed One,🔽they scattered them over him,

original: mngon par gtor to //
analyzed: mngon par gtor to //
translated: they scattered them over him,

original: 'di skad kyi tshig kyang brjod de /
analyzed: 'di skad kyi tshig kyang brjod de /
translated: and they uttered these words:

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Blessed One,

translated: “Bhagavān,🔽it is amazing that those bodhisattva mahāsattvas who have been accepted by the perfection of wisdom and skillful means have surpassed the roots of virtue of those sons of enlightened heritage or daughters of enlightened heritage who previously lacked skillful means,🔽who were practicing with reference points, and who were practicing the perfection of generosity,🔽the perfection of ethical discipline,

analyzed: zhes sgrar bsgrags te dbyangs su brjod do //
translated: Thus did they proclaim and utter their words.

original: de nas dge rgyas kyi lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag btsal te /🔽bcom ldan 'das /🔽de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pas yongs su bzung ba de dag gis rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo snga ma thabs mkhas pa dang @232b mi ldan pa /
analyzed: de nas dge rgyas kyi lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag btsal te / bcom ldan 'das / de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pas yongs su bzung ba de dag gis rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo snga ma thabs mkhas pa dang @232b mi ldan pa /
translated: Then many hundreds of thousands of millions of billions of gods from the Heaven of Joy came to where the Blessed One was, bowed their heads to the Blessed One’s feet,🔽and said:🔽“Blessed One, it is amazing that those bodhisattva great beings who are supported by the perfection of wisdom and skillful means have outshone the roots of virtue of those sons of enlightened heritage or daughters of enlightened heritage who previously lacked skillful means,

original: dmigs pa'i spyod pa can de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag zil gyis mnan pa ngo mtshar che'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i spyod pa can de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag zil gyis mnan pa ngo mtshar che'o //
translated: who engaged in conceptual thoughts, and who engaged in the practice of apprehending something.”

original: zhes sgrar bsgrags te dbyangs su brjod do //
analyzed: zhes sgrar bsgrags te dbyangs su brjod do //
translated: They proclaimed this in a loud voice.

original: de nas 'bras bu che ba'i lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag btsal te /
analyzed: de nas 'bras bu che ba'i lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag btsal te /
translated: Then many hundreds of thousands of millions of billions of gods from the Heaven of Great Fruition came to where the Blessed One was, bowed their heads to the Blessed One’s feet,🔽and said:

original: bcom ldan 'das /🔽de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pas yongs su bzung ba de dag gis rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo snga ma thabs mkhas pa dang mi ldan pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das / de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pas yongs su bzung ba de dag gis rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo snga ma thabs mkhas pa dang mi ldan pa /
translated: Blessed One,🔽it is amazing how those bodhisattva great beings, who are supported by the perfection of wisdom and skillful means, outshine the roots of virtue of those sons of enlightened heritage or daughters of enlightened heritage who lack skillful means,

original: dmigs pa'i spyod pa can de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag zil gyis mnan pa ngo mtshar che'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i spyod pa can de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag zil gyis mnan pa ngo mtshar che'o //
translated: who engage in conceptual thoughts, and who have previously appeared.

original: zhes sgrar bsgrags te dbyangs su brjod do //
analyzed: zhes sgrar bsgrags te dbyangs su brjod do //
translated: Thus it is proclaimed and expressed in song.🔽

original: de nas gnas gtsang ma'i lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag btsal te /
analyzed: de nas gnas gtsang ma'i lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag btsal te /
translated: Then many hundreds of thousands of quintillions of gods from the pure realms came to where the Blessed One was, bowed their heads to his two feet,

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: and said to the Blessed One,🔽“Blessed One,

original: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pas yongs su bzung ba de dag gis rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo snga ma thabs mkhas pa dang mi ldan pa /
analyzed: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pas yongs su bzung ba de dag gis rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo snga ma thabs mkhas pa dang mi ldan pa /
translated: In this way, the roots of virtue of those sons of enlightened heritage or daughters of enlightened heritage who are bodhisattvas and are possessed of the transcendent perfection of wisdom and skillful means surpass those of the earlier sons of enlightened heritage or daughters of enlightened heritage who are not possessed of skillful means,🔽who are engaged in the practice of apprehending something, and who are not possessed of the transcendent perfection of wisdom.

original: dmigs pa'i spyod pa can de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag zil gyis mnan pa ngo mtshar che'o //🔽zhes sgrar bsgrags te dbyangs su brjod do //🔽de nas @233a *//
analyzed: dmigs pa'i spyod pa can de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag zil gyis mnan pa ngo mtshar che'o // zhes sgrar bsgrags te dbyangs su brjod do // de nas @233a *//
translated: It is amazing how those bodhisattvas and great bodhisattvas who are possessed of the transcendent perfection of wisdom and skillful means surpass the roots of virtue of those earlier sons of enlightened heritage or daughters of enlightened heritage who are not possessed of skillful means,🔽who are engaged in the practice of apprehending something, and who are not possessed of the transcendent perfection of wisdom.”🔽Then the Blessed One addressed the gods of the Catur­mahā­rāja­kāyika realm, the gods of the Trayas­triṃśa realm, the gods of the Yāma realm, the gods of the Tuṣita realm, the gods of the Nirmāṇa­rata realm, and the gods of the Para­nirmita­vaśa­vartin realm, saying,

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang / mtshe ma'i lha rnams dang / dga' ldan gyi lha rnams dang / 'phrul dga'i lha rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang / mtshe ma'i lha rnams dang / dga' ldan gyi lha rnams dang / 'phrul dga'i lha rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang /
translated: “Excellent, excellent, divine princes!

original: tshangs ris kyi lha rnams dang / tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams dang / dge rgyas kyi lha rnams dang / 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams dang / gnas gtsang ma'i lha rnams la bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: tshangs ris kyi lha rnams dang / tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams dang / dge rgyas kyi lha rnams dang / 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams dang / gnas gtsang ma'i lha rnams la bka' stsal pa /
translated: to the Brahmakayika gods, to the Brahmapurohita gods, to the Brahmaparisadya gods, to the Mahabrahma gods, and to the gods of the Pure Abodes.

original: lha'i bu dag /🔽gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs par gyur te /
analyzed: lha'i bu dag / gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs par gyur te /
translated: Gods,🔽if all the sentient beings of the great trichiliocosm were to enter into the unsurpassed, perfect, complete enlightenment,

original: phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba de dag thams cad dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas de dag gis sems dang po bskyed pa nas dam pa'i chos gnas pa'i bar gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang /

of enlightenment up to the abiding of the holy Dharma, were to praise the Buddhas, the Blessed Ones, with all forms of praise, with words and with non-words, and if they were to make offerings to them original: gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa de dag thams cad gcig tu bsdus te dmigs su med pa'i tshul dang / gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma med pa'i tshul dang / chags pa med pa'i tshul dang / byed pa med pa'i tshul du rjes su yi rang ba'i rab kyis rjes su yi rang ba dang /
analyzed: gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa de dag thams cad gcig tu bsdus te dmigs su med pa'i tshul dang / gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma med pa'i tshul dang / chags pa med pa'i tshul dang / byed pa med pa'i tshul du rjes su yi rang ba'i rab kyis rjes su yi rang ba dang /
translated: and also all the limitless buddhadharmas, and they rejoice in them with the highest rejoicing, in the manner of non-apprehension, in the manner of non-duality, in the manner of signlessness, in the manner of non-attachment, and in the manner of non-action.

original: rjes su yi rang ba'i gtso bo dang / dam pa dang / mchog dang / phul dang / gya nom pa dang / bla na med pa dang / gong na med pa dang / mnyam pa med pa dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pas rjes su yi rang nas rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dmigs su med pa'i tshul dang /

translated: and the foremost, the excellent, the supreme, the best, the sublime, the unsurpassed, the highest, the unequaled, and the equal of the unequaled rejoicing, dedicates that wholesome action associated with rejoicing to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening, using the method of nonapprehending,

original: gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma med pa'i tshul dang / chags pa med pa'i tshul dang / byed pa med pa'i tshul gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo na /
analyzed: gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma med pa'i tshul dang / chags pa med pa'i tshul dang / byed pa med pa'i tshul gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo na /
translated: the method of nonduality, the method of signlessness, the method of nonattachment, and the method of nonaction.🔽If they do that,🔽those sons of a good family

original: rigs kyi bu'am; rigs kyi bu mo de ni /🔽rigs kyi bu'am /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu'am; rigs kyi bu mo de ni / rigs kyi bu'am /
translated: or those daughters of a good family

original: rigs kyi bu mo snga ma de dag pas bsod nams ches mang du 'phel te /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu mo snga ma de dag pas bsod nams ches mang du 'phel te /
translated: will have an increase in merit that is much greater than that of those previous sons of a good family or daughters of a good family.

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di la ni /
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di la ni /
translated: Compared to that wholesome root,

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba snga ma des brgya'i @235a *//
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba snga ma des brgya'i @235a *//
translated: that previous wholesome root is not even a hundredth part.

original: char yang nye bar mi 'gro /
analyzed: char yang nye bar mi 'gro /
translated: it does not approach a hundredth part,

original: stong gi cha dang / brgya stong gi cha dang / bye ba'i cha dang / bye ba brgya'i cha dang / bye ba stong gi cha dang / bye ba brgya stong gi cha dang / bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o /
analyzed: stong gi cha dang / brgya stong gi cha dang / bye ba'i cha dang / bye ba brgya'i cha dang / bye ba stong gi cha dang / bye ba brgya stong gi cha dang / bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o /
translated: a thousandth part, a hundred thousandth part, a ten millionth part, a thousand millionth part, a ten thousand millionth part, a million millionth part, or even a hundred thousand quintillionth part.

original: grangs dang / cha dang / bgrang ba dang / dpe dang / rgyur yang mi bzod de /
analyzed: grangs dang / cha dang / bgrang ba dang / dpe dang / rgyur yang mi bzod de /
translated: It cannot be calculated, measured, counted, exemplified, or compared.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dmigs su med pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dmigs su med pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni /
translated: The bodhisattva great beings’ dedication without reference points is

original: mchog ces bya'o //
analyzed: mchog ces bya'o //
translated: called the best,

original: gtso bo zhes bya'o //🔽dam pa zhes bya'o //🔽rab ces bya'o //
analyzed: gtso bo zhes bya'o // dam pa zhes bya'o // rab ces bya'o //
translated: the foremost,🔽the highest,

original: phul zhes bya'o //🔽gya nom pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: phul zhes bya'o // gya nom pa zhes bya'o //
translated: the most excellent,

original: bla na med pa zhes bya'o //🔽gong na med pa zhes bya'o //🔽mnyam pa med pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: bla na med pa zhes bya'o // gong na med pa zhes bya'o // mnyam pa med pa zhes bya'o //
translated: the unsurpassed,🔽the unequalled,🔽the incomparable,

original: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o //
translated: and the matchless.

original: de nas che dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: de nas che dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: Then the venerable Subhūti said to the Lord:

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis gang 'di skad du rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad mngon par bsdus te gcig tu brtul nas tshad bzung ste rjes su yi rang ba'i rab kyis rjes su yi rang ba dang /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis gang 'di skad du rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad mngon par bsdus te gcig tu brtul nas tshad bzung ste rjes su yi rang ba'i rab kyis rjes su yi rang ba dang /
translated: “Lord, when the Lord says, ‘The sons of a good family or daughters of a good family who have gathered all those wholesome roots together, combined them into one, and measured them, and with the highest rejoicing rejoice in them,

original: rjes su yi rang ba'i gtso bo dang / dam pa dang / mchog dang / phul dang / gya nom pa dang / bla na med pa dang / gong na med pa dang / mnyam pa med pa dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pas rjes su yi rang bar byed do //🔽zhes bka' stsal na /🔽bcom @235b ldan 'das /
analyzed: rjes su yi rang ba'i gtso bo dang / dam pa dang / mchog dang / phul dang / gya nom pa dang / bla na med pa dang / gong na med pa dang / mnyam pa med pa dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pas rjes su yi rang bar byed do // zhes bka' stsal na / bcom @235b ldan 'das /
translated: with the best, the highest, the choicest, the most excellent, the unsurpassed, the unequalled, the equal of the unequaled rejoicing rejoice in them,’🔽Lord,

original: ji tsam gyis na /🔽rjes su yi rang ba'i dam par 'gyur /
analyzed: ji tsam gyis na / rjes su yi rang ba'i dam par 'gyur /
translated: how much is the highest rejoicing?

original: ji tsam gyis na /
analyzed: ji tsam gyis na /
translated: How much is the best,🔽the highest, the choicest, the most excellent, the unsurpassed, the unequalled, the equal of the unequaled rejoicing?

original: rjes su yi rang ba'i gtso bo dang / dam pa dang / mchog dang / phul dang / gya nom pa dang / bla na med pa dang / gong na ma mchis pa dang / mnyam pa ma mchis pa dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam par gyur pa lags /🔽bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /🔽nam rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas de dag dang /
analyzed: rjes su yi rang ba'i gtso bo dang / dam pa dang / mchog dang / phul dang / gya nom pa dang / bla na med pa dang / gong na ma mchis pa dang / mnyam pa ma mchis pa dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam par gyur pa lags / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa / nam rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas de dag dang /
translated: the foremost, the holy, the supreme, the excellent, the sublime, the unsurpassed, the unequalled, the equal of the unequaled, the rejoicing in virtue of all sentient beings, the rejoicing in virtue of all the noble solitary buddhas, the rejoicing in virtue of all the bodhisattvas, the rejoicing in virtue of all the śrāvakas, the rejoicing in virtue of all the buddhas, the rejoicing in virtue of all sentient beings’ roots of virtue, the rejoicing in virtue of the past, future, and present thus-gone, worthy, perfect buddhas together with their saṅgha of hearers and the solitary buddhas,🔽the rejoicing in virtue of all sentient beings’ roots of virtue, the rejoicing in virtue of the past, future, and present thus-gone, worthy, perfect buddhas together with their saṅgha of hearers and the solitary buddhas,🔽the rejoicing in virtue of all sentient beings’ roots of virtue, the rejoicing in virtue of the past, future, and present thus-gone, worthy, perfect buddhas together with their saṅgha of hearers and the solitary buddhas,🔽the rejoicing in virtue of all sentient beings’ roots of virtue, the rejoicing in virtue of the past, future, and present thus-gone, worthy, perfect buddhas together with their saṅgha of hearers and the solitary buddhas,🔽the rejoicing in virtue of all sentient beings’ roots of virtue, the rejoicing in virtue of the past, future, and present thus-gone, worthy, perfect buddhas together with their saṅgha of hearers and the solitary buddhas,🔽the rejoicing in virtue of all sentient beings’ roots of virtue, the rejoicing in virtue of the past, future, and present thus-gone, worthy, perfect buddhas together with their saṅgha of hearers and the solitary buddhas,🔽the rejoicing in virtue of all sentient beings’ roots of virtue, the rejoicing in virtue of the past, future, and present thus-gone, worthy, perfect buddhas together with their saṅgha of hearers and the solitary buddhas,

original: sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag mi len mi gtong ba dang / mi rlom mi 'jum zhing /🔽dmigs par yang ma yin /🔽mi dmigs par yang ma yin la /
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag mi len mi gtong ba dang / mi rlom mi 'jum zhing / dmigs par yang ma yin / mi dmigs par yang ma yin la /
translated: the rejoicing in virtue of all sentient beings’ roots of virtue, the rejoicing in virtue of the past, future, and present thus-gone, worthy, perfect buddhas together with their saṅgha of hearers and the solitary buddhas,

original: de 'di snyam du 'di la chos gang yang skye ba'ang med /
analyzed: de 'di snyam du 'di la chos gang yang skye ba'ang med /
translated: the rejoicing in virtue of all sentient beings’ roots of virtue, the rejoicing in virtue

original: 'gag pa'ang med /
analyzed: 'gag pa'ang med /
translated: Nor does it cease.

original: nyon mongs par 'gyur ba'ang med /
analyzed: nyon mongs par 'gyur ba'ang med /
translated: Nor does it become afflicted.

original: rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba'ang med /🔽de chos de dag la 'grib pa'ang med /
analyzed: rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba'ang med / de chos de dag la 'grib pa'ang med /
translated: Nor does it become purified.🔽It does not decrease

original: 'phel ba'ang med /🔽'ong ba'ang med /
analyzed: 'phel ba'ang med / 'ong ba'ang med /
translated: or increase.

original: 'gro ba'ang med /
analyzed: 'gro ba'ang med /
translated: It does not come or go.

original: phung por 'gyur ba'ang med do //
analyzed: phung por 'gyur ba'ang med do //
translated: It does not become a heap.

original: zhes rnam grangs de lta bus 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang /
analyzed: zhes rnam grangs de lta bus 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang /
translated: In this way, the suchness of past, future, and present phenomena, their unaltered suchness, their unmistaken suchness, their inalienable suchness, their nature, their substance,

original: chos skyon med @236a *//
analyzed: chos skyon med @236a *//
translated: their unerring nature,🔽and their true mode of being are just as they are.

original: pa nyid ji lta ba de ltar bdag gis rjes su yi rang bar bya'o //
analyzed: pa nyid ji lta ba de ltar bdag gis rjes su yi rang bar bya'o //
translated: I rejoice in them.

original: rjes su yi rang nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: rjes su yi rang nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: Having rejoiced, I dedicate them to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: zhes de ltar yongs su bsngo ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rjes su yi rang ba de ni /
analyzed: zhes de ltar yongs su bsngo ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rjes su yi rang ba de ni /
translated: Thus, the rejoicing of the bodhisattva mahāsattva who dedicates in this way is

original: dam par 'gyur te /
analyzed: dam par 'gyur te /
translated: the best.

original: rjes su yi rang ba de dag ni /
analyzed: rjes su yi rang ba de dag ni /
translated: Those who rejoice

original: gtso bo dang / dam pa dang / mchog dang / phul dang / gya nom pa dang / bla na med pa dang / gong na med pa dang / mnyam pa med pa dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gtso bo dang / dam pa dang / mchog dang / phul dang / gya nom pa dang / bla na med pa dang / gong na med pa dang / mnyam pa med pa dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam par 'gyur ro //
translated: are the foremost, the best, the most excellent, the most sublime, the most refined, the unsurpassed, the unequaled, the equal of the unequaled.

original: rab 'byor / rjes su yi rang ba 'di la ni /
analyzed: rab 'byor / rjes su yi rang ba 'di la ni /
translated: Subhūti, in this rejoicing

original: de ma yin pa'i rjes su yi rang ba gzhan thams cad kyis brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o //
analyzed: de ma yin pa'i rjes su yi rang ba gzhan thams cad kyis brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o //
translated: all other forms of rejoicing are not even a hundredth part,

original: stong gi cha dang / brgya stong gi cha dang / bye ba'i cha dang / bye ba brgya'i cha dang / bye ba stong gi cha dang / bye ba brgya stong gi cha dang / bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro ste /
analyzed: stong gi cha dang / brgya stong gi cha dang / bye ba'i cha dang / bye ba brgya'i cha dang / bye ba stong gi cha dang / bye ba brgya stong gi cha dang / bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro ste /
translated: not even a thousandth part, not even a hundred thousandth part, not even a ten millionth part, not even a one hundred millionth part, not even a one billionth part, not even a hundred billionth part, not even a trillionth part.

original: rjes su yi rang ba 'di ni /
analyzed: rjes su yi rang ba 'di ni /
translated: This rejoicing

original: de ma yin pa'i rjes su yi rang ba gzhan dag pas rab ces bya'o //
analyzed: de ma yin pa'i rjes su yi rang ba gzhan dag pas rab ces bya'o //
translated: the other forms of rejoicing are the best.

original: gtso bo zhes bya'o //🔽dam pa zhes bya'o //🔽mchog ces bya'o //
analyzed: gtso bo zhes bya'o // dam pa zhes bya'o // mchog ces bya'o //
translated: they are the foremost,🔽the highest,🔽the most excellent,

original: phul zhes bya'o //🔽gya nom pa zhes bya'o //🔽bla na med pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: phul zhes bya'o // gya nom pa zhes bya'o // bla na med pa zhes bya'o //
translated: the most sublime,🔽the most refined,🔽the unsurpassed,

original: gong na med pa zhes bya'o; ;mnyam pa med pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: gong na med pa zhes bya'o; ;mnyam pa med pa zhes bya'o //
translated: the unequaled,

original: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o //
translated: and the equal of the unequaled.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos @236b 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag dang /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos @236b 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag dang /
translated: “Moreover, Subhūti, the sons of a good family and the daughters of a good family in the vehicle of the bodhisattvas should rejoice in the wholesome roots of the tathāgatas, worthy ones, perfectly complete buddhas of the past, future, and present.

original: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas su bcas pa de dag gis sems dang po bskyed pa nas dam pa'i chos gnas pa'i bar gyi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
analyzed: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas su bcas pa de dag gis sems dang po bskyed pa nas dam pa'i chos gnas pa'i bar gyi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
translated: and the śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas, from the first production of the mind of awakening up to the abiding of the true Dharma, the perfection of generosity, the perfection of moral discipline, the perfection of patience,

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang /
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang /
translated: the perfection of diligence, the perfection of concentration, the perfection of wisdom, the roots of virtue endowed with the perfections, the moral discipline, the meditative stabilization, the wisdom,

original: rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po ji snyed pa dang / gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa ji snyed pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba ji snyed pa de dag thams cad la rjes su yi rang bar 'dod na /
analyzed: rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po ji snyed pa dang / gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa ji snyed pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba ji snyed pa de dag thams cad la rjes su yi rang bar 'dod na /
translated: the aggregate of liberation, and the aggregate of the wisdom of liberation, and also the limitless qualities of the buddhas, and all the roots of virtue of all sentient beings, if you wish to rejoice in all of them,

original: 'di ltar rjes su yi rang bar bya'o //🔽rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni /
analyzed: 'di ltar rjes su yi rang bar bya'o // rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni /
translated: In this way, one should rejoice.🔽Form is just like liberation.🔽Feeling is just like liberation.🔽Perception is just like liberation.

original: gzugs so // rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni /🔽tshor ba'o // rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni /
analyzed: gzugs so // rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni / tshor ba'o // rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni /

original: 'du shes so //
analyzed: 'du shes so //

analyzed: rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni; tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfections are just like liberation.

analyzed: rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //

analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid do // rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni /

analyzed: rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni / rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //

analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid do // rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do //

original: phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan mang pos rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba'i don du nyams su len cing /

original: de dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sbyin pa sbyin pa dang / de dmigs pa'i tshul gyis tshul khrims bsrung ba dang / de dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bzod pa sgom pa dang / de @240b dmigs pa'i tshul gyis brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / de dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug pa dang /

translated: “They practice generosity with the idea of that, they guard morality with the idea of that, they cultivate patience with the idea of that, they make an effort at perseverance with the idea of that, they become absorbed in concentration with the idea of that,

original: de dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shes rab sgom pas /
analyzed: de dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shes rab sgom pas /
translated: They cultivate wisdom by way of observing that.

original: rigs kyi bu'am /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu'am /
translated: “Son of a good family or

original: rigs kyi bu mo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa gang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis spyod pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis spyod pa dang /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu mo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa gang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis spyod pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis spyod pa dang /
translated: daughter of a good family who has set out for unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening practices the perfection of giving by way of not apprehending anything, practices the perfection of morality by way of not apprehending anything,

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis spyod pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis spyod pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis spyod pa dang /

translated: practices the perfection of patience by way of not apprehending anything, practices the perfection of perseverance by way of not apprehending anything, practices the perfection of concentration by way of not apprehending anything,🔽and practices the perfection of wisdom by way of not apprehending anything.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis spyod pa'i tshe thabs mkhas pas dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos na /

translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom by way of not apprehending anything, if they, through skill in means, dedicate those wholesome roots to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening,

original: bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du bya ba 'di la ni /
analyzed: bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du bya ba 'di la ni /
translated: compared to the merit made by the previous dedication of wholesome roots,

analyzed: bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba snga mas brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o //

original: stong gi cha dang / brgya stong gi cha dang / bye ba'i cha dang / bye ba brgya'i cha dang / bye ba stong gi cha dang / bye ba brgya stong gi cha dang / bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o //🔽grangs dang / cha dang / bgrang @241a *//

analyzed: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o //

translated: “Subhūti, in that way bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of giving, practicing the perfection of conduct, practicing the perfection of patience,

translated: When practicing the perfection of effort, the perfection of meditation, and the perfection of wisdom, they should, through skillful means, dedicate those wholesome roots to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las; yongs su bsngo ba'i le'u ste /
