original: bcom ldan 'das; shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das; shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni /
translated: Blessed One, the perfection of wisdom

original: mi rtag mi 'jig pa'i slad du 'khor ba'i gnyan po'o //
analyzed: mi rtag mi 'jig pa'i slad du 'khor ba'i gnyan po'o //
translated: is the antidote to saṃsāra because it is impermanent and indestructible.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni /
translated: the perfection of wisdom

original: chos rin po che thams cad stob pa'i slad du sems can mgon ma mchis pa rnams kyi mgon bgyid pa'o //
analyzed: chos rin po che thams cad stob pa'i slad du sems can mgon ma mchis pa rnams kyi mgon bgyid pa'o //
translated: is the protector of beings without a protector because it provides all precious Dharma teachings.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni /
translated: the perfection of wisdom

original: thub pa ma mchis pa'i slad du stobs bcu bgyid pa'o //
analyzed: thub pa ma mchis pa'i slad du stobs bcu bgyid pa'o //
translated: is the ten powers because it is invincible.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni /
translated: the perfection of wisdom

original: 'gro ba dang ldog pa ma mchis pa'i slad du rnam pa bcu gnyis rgyud gsum du 'khor ba'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'o //
analyzed: 'gro ba dang ldog pa ma mchis pa'i slad du rnam pa bcu gnyis rgyud gsum du 'khor ba'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'o //
translated: is the turning of the wheel of Dharma in the three times and twelve aspects because it does not go or come.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni /
translated: the perfection of wisdom

original: dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi slad du chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid ston pa'o //
analyzed: dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi slad du chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid ston pa'o //
translated: is the teaching of the nature of all phenomena because it is the emptiness of the nature of non-entities.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: byang chub sems dpa'am /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'am /
translated: how should a bodhisattva

original: byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'am /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'am /

original: nyan thos sam /
analyzed: nyan thos sam /
translated: or a śrāvaka,

original: nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'am /
analyzed: nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'am /
translated: or one who has set out in the Śrāvaka Vehicle,

original: rang sangs rgyas sam /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas sam /
translated: or a pratyekabuddha,

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pas ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par bgyi /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pas ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par bgyi /
translated: or one who has set out in the Pratyekabuddha Vehicle, abide in the perfection of wisdom?

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: “Śāradvatīputra,

original: ston pa la ji lta ba de @242b bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par bya'o //
analyzed: ston pa la ji lta ba de @242b bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par bya'o //
translated: just as you pay homage to the Teacher, so you should abide in the perfection of wisdom.

original: ston pa la ji ltar phyag bya ba de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag bya'o //
analyzed: ston pa la ji ltar phyag bya ba de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag bya'o //
translated: Just as you pay homage to the Teacher, so you should pay homage to the perfection of wisdom.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid ston pa yin te /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid ston pa yin te /
translated: This perfection of wisdom itself is the Teacher.

original: ston pa'ang gzhan ma yin /
analyzed: ston pa'ang gzhan ma yin /
translated: The Teacher is not one thing,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzhan ma yin /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzhan ma yin /
translated: and the perfection of wisdom another.

original: ston pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang ston pa'o //
analyzed: ston pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang ston pa'o //
translated: The Teacher himself is the perfection of wisdom, and the perfection of wisdom itself is the Teacher.

original: de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'byung ngo //
analyzed: de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'byung ngo //
translated: Therefore, from the perfection of wisdom come the Tathāgatas, Arhats, Perfectly Awakened Ones.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'byung ngo //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'byung ngo //
translated: From it come the Bodhisattva-mahāsattvas.

original: rang sangs rgyas rnams 'byung ngo //🔽dgra bcom pa rnams 'byung ngo //
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas rnams 'byung ngo // dgra bcom pa rnams 'byung ngo //
translated: From it come the pratyekabuddhas.🔽From it come the arhats.

original: phyir mi 'ong ba rnams 'byung ngo //
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba rnams 'byung ngo //
translated: From it come the non-returners.

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams 'byung ngo //
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams 'byung ngo //
translated: From it come the once-returners.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa rnams 'byung ngo //
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa rnams 'byung ngo //
translated: From it come the stream-enterers.

original: de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams 'byung ngo //
analyzed: de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams 'byung ngo //
translated: Therefore, from the perfection of wisdom come the ten wholesome courses of action.

original: bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /🔽brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / @243a *//
analyzed: bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / @243a *//
translated: the four concentrations, the four immeasurables, the four formless absorptions, the five kinds of clairvoyance, the transcendent perfection of generosity, the transcendent perfection of ethical discipline, the transcendent perfection of tolerance,🔽the transcendent perfection of perseverance, the transcendent perfection of meditative concentration, the transcendent perfection of wisdom, inner emptiness,

original: phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /
translated: outer emptiness, inner and outer emptiness, the emptiness of emptiness, great emptiness, ultimate emptiness, the emptiness of conditioned phenomena, the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena,

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /
translated: the emptiness of the unlimited, the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end, the emptiness of non-dispersal, the emptiness of inherent existence, the emptiness of all phenomena, the emptiness of intrinsic characteristics,

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /
translated: the emptiness of non-apprehension, the emptiness of non-entities, the emptiness of essential nature, and the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities.🔽There are the four applications of mindfulness, the four correct exertions,

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang /
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang /
translated: the four supports for miraculous ability, the five faculties, the five powers, the seven branches of enlightenment, the noble eightfold path, the four noble truths, the four meditative concentrations, the four immeasurables,

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang /
translated: the four formless absorptions, the eight aspects of liberation, the nine serial steps of meditative absorption, the emptiness gate of liberation, the signlessness gate of liberation, the wishlessness gate of liberation,

original: mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / @243b mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / snying rje chen po dang /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / @243b mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / snying rje chen po dang /
translated: the extrasensory powers, the meditative stabilities, the dhāraṇī gateways, the ten powers of the tathāgatas, the four forms of fearlessness, the four forms of correct knowledge, great compassion,

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang /
translated: the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas, the fruit of entering the stream, the fruit of being tied to one more rebirth, the fruit of no longer being subject to rebirth, arhatship, individual enlightenment, the knowledge of path aspects,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'byung ngo //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'byung ngo //
translated: the knowledge of all aspects will arise.

original: de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du gyur te /
analyzed: de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du gyur te /
translated: Then Śakra, Lord of the Gods, thought this:

original: btsun pa sh'a radva ti'i bu'i zhu ba 'di gang las skyes /
analyzed: btsun pa sh'a radva ti'i bu'i zhu ba 'di gang las skyes /
translated: “From where has this question of the Venerable Śāradvatīputra arisen?🔽What is the cause?”

original: ci'i rgyu snyam pa dang / de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bus lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so //
analyzed: ci'i rgyu snyam pa dang / de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bus lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so //
translated: Then the Venerable Śāradvatīputra said to Śakra, Lord of the Gods:

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: “Kauśika,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung ba rnams ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung ba rnams ni /
translated: the bodhisattva great beings who are held by the perfection of wisdom

original: thabs mkhas pas 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi thugs dang po bskyed pa nas dam pa'i chos gnas pa'i bar gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa dang /
analyzed: thabs mkhas pas 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi thugs dang po bskyed pa nas dam pa'i chos gnas pa'i bar gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa dang /
translated: with skillful means, from the first production of the thought of awakening up to the establishment of the good Dharma of those past, future, and present lord buddhas, together with the community of śrāvakas,

original: rang sangs rgyas dang bcas pa de dag dang / sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad gcig tu bsdus te rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo bas na /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas dang bcas pa de dag dang / sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad gcig tu bsdus te rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo bas na /
translated: and all the wholesome roots of all the śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas and all sentient beings, and dedicates them to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening,

original: bdag gi zhu ba skyes so //
analyzed: bdag gi zhu ba skyes so //
translated: my question has arisen.

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: Kauśika,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni /
translated: this perfection of wisdom of bodhisattva great beings

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu @244a *//🔽phyin pa zil gyis gnon to //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu @244a *// phyin pa zil gyis gnon to //
translated: overpowers the perfection of giving,

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa zil gyis gnon to //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa zil gyis gnon to //
translated: overpowers the perfection of morality, perfection of patience, perfection of perseverance, and perfection of concentration.

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: Kauśika,

original: 'di lta ste /🔽dper na / dmus long brgya'am /
analyzed: 'di lta ste / dper na / dmus long brgya'am /
translated: it is like this:🔽even a hundred blind people,

original: stong ngam / brgya phrag stong yang rung ste /
analyzed: stong ngam / brgya phrag stong yang rung ste /
translated: or a thousand, or a hundred thousand blind people,

original: dmigs bu med par lam du 'jug par yang mi nus na /
analyzed: dmigs bu med par lam du 'jug par yang mi nus na /
translated: cannot go on a road without a guide,

original: grong khyer du 'gro bar lta ga la nus /
analyzed: grong khyer du 'gro bar lta ga la nus /
translated: How could they possibly enter a city?

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: Kauśika,

original: de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po 'di dag ni /
analyzed: de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po 'di dag ni /
translated: in the same way, these five perfections

original: dmus long lta bur gyur pa ste /
analyzed: dmus long lta bur gyur pa ste /
translated: are like people who are blind from birth.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med na /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med na /
translated: Without the perfection of wisdom,

original: de dag la dmigs bu med pas /
analyzed: de dag la dmigs bu med pas /
translated: they have no guide,

original: byang chub kyi lam yang bskyed mi nus na /
analyzed: byang chub kyi lam yang bskyed mi nus na /
translated: and so they are unable to generate the path to awakening,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi grong khyer du 'jug par lta ga la nus /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi grong khyer du 'jug par lta ga la nus /
translated: let alone enter the city of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: Kauśika,

original: pha rol tu phyin pa lnga nam shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin par gyur pa de'i tshe mig dang ldan par gyur te /🔽pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po 'di dag ni /
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa lnga nam shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin par gyur pa de'i tshe mig dang ldan par gyur te / pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po 'di dag ni /
translated: when the five perfections are embraced by the perfection of wisdom, then they have eyes.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung na /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung na /
translated: When the five perfections are embraced by the perfection of wisdom,

original: pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming 'thob bo //
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming 'thob bo //
translated: they obtain the name of perfections.

original: de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so //
analyzed: de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so //
translated: Then Śatakratu, head of the gods, said to the venerable Śāradvatīputra,🔽“Venerable monk Śāradvatīputra,

original: btsun pa sh'a radva ti'i bus gang 'di skad du /
analyzed: btsun pa sh'a radva ti'i bus gang 'di skad du /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra said,

original: pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po 'di dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung na /🔽pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming 'thob po //
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po 'di dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung na / pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming 'thob po //
translated: “If these five perfections are embraced by the perfection of wisdom,

original: zhes smras na /
analyzed: zhes smras na /
translated: they obtain the name of perfections.”

original: btsun pa sh'a radva @244b ti'i bu; de ni /
analyzed: btsun pa sh'a radva @244b ti'i bu; de ni /
translated: “Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: der yang ma zad de /
analyzed: der yang ma zad de /
translated: it is not only that.

original: pha rol tu phyin pa lnga ni /
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa lnga ni /
translated: The five perfections

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung yang pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming 'thob bo //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung yang pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming 'thob bo //
translated: obtain the name of perfections when embraced by the perfection of generosity.

original: pha rol tu phyin pa lnga ni /
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa lnga ni /
translated: The five perfections

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung yang pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming 'thob bo //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung yang pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming 'thob bo //
translated: obtain the name of perfections when embraced by the perfection of moral discipline.

original: pha rol tu phyin pa lnga ni /
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa lnga ni /
translated: The five perfections

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung yang pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming 'thob bo //
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung yang pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming 'thob bo //
translated: obtain the name of perfections when embraced by the perfection of patience.

original: pha rol tu phyin pa lnga ni /
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa lnga ni /
translated: The five perfections🔽obtain the name of perfections when embraced by the perfection of perseverance.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung yang pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming 'thob bo //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung yang pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming 'thob bo //

analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa lnga ni /

analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa lnga ni /
translated: The five perfections

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung bas pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming 'thob par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung bas pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming 'thob par mi 'gyur /

analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa lnga ni /
translated: The five perfections

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung bas pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming 'thob par mi 'gyur /

analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa lnga ni / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung bas @245a *//

analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming 'thob par mi 'gyur gyi /

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /

analyzed: de bas na /

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni /

analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po 'di dag gi rab ces bya'o //

translated: It is called the best, the supreme, the highest, the most excellent, the sublime, the unsurpassed, and the unequalled.

analyzed: de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /

analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ji ltar mngon par bsgrub par bgyi /

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /

analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /

original: gzugs mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: gzugs mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be practiced because form is not accomplished.

original: tshor ba mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon @245b par bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: tshor ba mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon @245b par bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be practiced because feeling is not accomplished.

analyzed: 'du shes mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be practiced because perception is not accomplished.

original: 'du byed mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: 'du byed mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //

original: rnam par shes pa mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //

original: mig mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: mig mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be practiced because the eyes are not accomplished.

original: rna ba mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: rna ba mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //

original: sna mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: sna mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //

analyzed: lce mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //

analyzed: lus mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //

original: gzugs mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: gzugs mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //

translated: The perfection of wisdom should be accomplished because of the non-establishment of sound.🔽The perfection of wisdom should be accomplished because of the non-establishment of smell.

original: lus kyi rnam par shes pa mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: lus kyi rnam par shes pa mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //

translated: The perfection of wisdom should be accomplished because the coming together of eye contact is not accomplished.🔽The perfection of wisdom should be accomplished because the coming together of ear contact is not accomplished.🔽The perfection of wisdom should be accomplished because the coming together of nose contact is not accomplished.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be accomplished because the coming together of tongue contact is not accomplished.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be accomplished because the coming together of body contact is not accomplished.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be accomplished because of the non-establishment of mental contact.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //🔽rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyan gyis tshor ba mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //🔽sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyan gyis tshor ba mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o // sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be accomplished because of the non-establishment of feeling that arises from the condition of eye contact.🔽The perfection of wisdom should be accomplished because of the non-establishment of feeling that arises from the condition of ear contact.🔽The perfection of wisdom should be accomplished because of the non-establishment of feeling that arises from the condition of nose contact.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be accomplished because of the non-establishment of feeling that arises from the condition of tongue contact.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: For the non-establishment of feeling that has contact with the body as a condition, the perfection of wisdom should be accomplished.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin @247a *//🔽pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //🔽sa'i khams mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin @247a *// pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o // sa'i khams mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: For the non-establishment of feeling that has contact with the mind as a condition, the perfection of wisdom should be accomplished.🔽For the non-establishment of the earth element, the perfection of wisdom should be accomplished.

original: chu'i khams mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: chu'i khams mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: For the non-establishment of the water element, the perfection of wisdom should be accomplished.

original: me'i khams mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: me'i khams mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: For the non-establishment of the fire element, the perfection of wisdom should be accomplished.🔽For the non-establishment of the wind element, the perfection of wisdom should be accomplished.

original: rlung gi khams mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: rlung gi khams mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: For the non-establishment of the wind element the perfection of wisdom should be made.

original: nam mkha'i khams mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //🔽rnam par shes pa'i khams mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o // rnam par shes pa'i khams mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: For the non-establishment of the space element the perfection of wisdom should be made.🔽For the non-establishment of the consciousness element the perfection of wisdom should be made.

original: ma rig pa mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //🔽'du byed mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: ma rig pa mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o // 'du byed mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: For the non-establishment of ignorance the perfection of wisdom should be made.🔽For the non-establishment of volitions the perfection of wisdom should be made.

original: rnam par shes pa mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: For the non-establishment of consciousness the perfection of wisdom should be made.

original: ming dang gzugs mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: ming dang gzugs mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: For the non-establishment of name-and-form, the perfection of wisdom should be accomplished.

original: skye mched drug mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon @247b par bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: skye mched drug mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon @247b par bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: For the non-establishment of the six sense spheres, the perfection of wisdom should be accomplished.

original: reg pa mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: reg pa mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: For the non-establishment of contact, the perfection of wisdom should be accomplished.

original: tshor ba mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //🔽sred pa mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //

translated: For the non-establishment of feeling, the perfection of wisdom should be accomplished.🔽For the non-establishment of craving, the perfection of wisdom should be accomplished.

original: len pa mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: len pa mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: For the non-establishment of grasping, the perfection of wisdom should be accomplished.🔽For the non-establishment of existence, the perfection of wisdom should be accomplished.

original: srid pa mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: srid pa mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: For the non-establishment of becoming, the perfection of wisdom should be accomplished.

original: skye ba mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: skye ba mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: For the non-establishment of birth, the perfection of wisdom should be accomplished.

original: rga shi mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: rga shi mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: For the non-establishment of old age and death, the perfection of wisdom should be accomplished.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: For the non-establishment of the perfection of generosity, the perfection of wisdom should be accomplished.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: For the non-establishment of the perfection of morality, the perfection of wisdom should be accomplished.

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: For the non-establishment of the perfection of patience, the perfection of wisdom should be accomplished.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //🔽bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par sgrub pa med @248a *//
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o // bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par sgrub pa med @248a *//
translated: For the non-establishment of the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of wisdom should be accomplished.🔽For the non-establishment of the perfection of concentration, the perfection of wisdom should be accomplished.

analyzed: pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o ////
translated: For the non-establishment of the perfection of wisdom, the perfection of wisdom should be accomplished.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa /
translated: Perfection of Wisdom in One Hundred Thousand Lines

original: bam po brgya zhe gsum pa /🔽nang stong pa nyid mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: bam po brgya zhe gsum pa / nang stong pa nyid mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: Volume 133🔽For the non-establishment of inner emptiness, the perfection of wisdom should be accomplished.

original: phyi stong pa nyid mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: For the non-establishment of outer emptiness, the perfection of wisdom should be accomplished.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be practiced because of the non-establishment of the emptiness of the external and the emptiness of the internal.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be practiced because of the non-establishment of the emptiness of emptiness.

original: chen po stong pa nyid mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //🔽don dam pa stong pa nyid mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o // don dam pa stong pa nyid mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be practiced because of the non-establishment of the emptiness of the great.🔽The perfection of wisdom should be practiced because of the non-establishment of the emptiness of the ultimate.

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be practiced because of the non-establishment of the emptiness of the conditioned.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be practiced because the emptiness of the unconditioned is non-established.

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par @248b bsgrub par bya'o //🔽thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par @248b bsgrub par bya'o // thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be practiced because the emptiness of what transcends extremes is non-established.🔽The perfection of wisdom should be practiced because the emptiness of what is beginningless and endless is non-established.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be practiced because the emptiness of what is not to be discarded is non-established.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be practiced because the emptiness of the intrinsic nature is non-established.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be practiced because all dharmas are not accomplished in emptiness.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //🔽mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o // mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be practiced because the emptiness of specific characteristics is not accomplished.🔽The perfection of wisdom should be practiced because the emptiness of non-apprehension is not accomplished.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be practiced because the emptiness of non-things is not accomplished.

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be practiced because the emptiness of essential nature is not accomplished.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be practiced because the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities is not accomplished.

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub bar bya'o //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub bar bya'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be practiced because the applications of mindfulness are not accomplished.🔽The perfection of wisdom should be practiced because the right efforts

original: yang dag par spong @249a *//🔽ba rnams mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //🔽rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: yang dag par spong @249a *// ba rnams mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o // rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: are not accomplished.🔽The perfection of wisdom should be practiced because the bases of supernatural powers are not accomplished.

original: dbang po rnams mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: dbang po rnams mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be practiced because the faculties are not accomplished.

original: stobs rnams mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: stobs rnams mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: For the sake of non-establishment of the powers, the perfection of wisdom should be made.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: For the sake of non-establishment of the limbs of awakening, the perfection of wisdom should be made.

original: lam rnams mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //🔽'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //🔽bsam gtan rnams mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: lam rnams mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o // 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o // bsam gtan rnams mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: For the sake of non-establishment of the path, the perfection of wisdom should be made.🔽For the sake of non-establishment of the noble truths, the perfection of wisdom should be made.🔽For the sake of non-establishment of the concentrations, the perfection of wisdom should be made.

original: tshad med pa rnams mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: For the sake of non-establishment of the immeasurables, the perfection of wisdom should be made.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be practiced because the formless absorptions are not to be accomplished.

original: rnam par thar pa rnams mngon par sgrub @249b pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa rnams mngon par sgrub @249b pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be practiced because the liberations are not to be accomplished.

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be practiced because the serial absorptions are not to be accomplished.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be practiced because the emptiness, signless, and wishless gates of liberation are not to be accomplished.

original: mngon par shes pa rnams mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be practiced because the superknowledges are not to be accomplished.

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be practiced because the meditative stabilities are not to be accomplished.

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be practiced because the dhāraṇī gateways are not to be accomplished.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o; ;mi 'jigs pa rnams mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o; ;mi 'jigs pa rnams mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be practiced because the ten powers of the tathāgatas are not to be accomplished. The perfection of wisdom should be practiced because the four fearlessnesses are not to be accomplished.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be practiced because the four detailed and thorough knowledges are not to be accomplished.

original: snying rje chen po mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par @250a *//
analyzed: snying rje chen po mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par @250a *//
translated: For the nonaccomplishment of great compassion, one should accomplish the perfection of wisdom.

original: bya'o; ;sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: bya'o; ;sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: For the nonaccomplishment of the unique qualities of the Buddha, one should accomplish the perfection of wisdom.

original: thams cad shes pa nyid mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: thams cad shes pa nyid mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: For the nonaccomplishment of the knowledge of all aspects, one should accomplish the perfection of wisdom.

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: For the nonaccomplishment of the knowledge of the aspects of the path, one should accomplish the perfection of wisdom.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: For the nonaccomplishment of the knowledge of all bases, one should accomplish the perfection of wisdom.

original: de bzhin du chos thams cad mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du chos thams cad mngon par sgrub pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: Similarly, because all dharmas are not accomplished, the perfection of wisdom should be accomplished.

original: gsol pa; bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa; bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Śāriputra said, “Lord,

original: ji ltar gzugs mngon par sgrub pa ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bgyi /
analyzed: ji ltar gzugs mngon par sgrub pa ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bgyi /
translated: how should the perfection of wisdom be accomplished because form is not accomplished?

original: ji ltar tshor ba mngon par sgrub pa ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bgyi /
analyzed: ji ltar tshor ba mngon par sgrub pa ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bgyi /

analyzed: ji ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par sgrub pa ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bgyi /

translated: How should the perfection of wisdom be made to stand by way of the emptiness of not being abandoned?🔽How should the perfection of wisdom be made to stand by way of the emptiness of nature?

translated: How should the perfection of wisdom be made to stand by way of the emptiness of all phenomena?🔽How should the perfection of wisdom be made to stand by way of the emptiness of its own mark?

analyzed: ji ltar mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mngon par sgrub pa ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bgyi /

translated: How should one accomplish the perfection of wisdom because of the non-establishment of emptiness of the essential nature of non-things?

analyzed: ji ltar yang dag par spong ba rnams mngon par sgrub pa ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bgyi; ji ltar rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mngon par sgrub pa ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bgyi / ji ltar dbang po rnams mngon @254b par sgrub pa ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bgyi / ji ltar stobs rnams mngon par sgrub pa ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bgyi /
translated: How should one practice the perfection of wisdom because the legs of miraculous power do not exist?🔽How should one practice the perfection of wisdom because the faculties do not exist?🔽How should one practice the perfection of wisdom because the powers do not exist?

translated: How should one practice the perfection of wisdom because the branches of enlightenment do not exist?

original: ji ltar 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mngon par sgrub pa ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bgyi /

original: ji ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mngon par sgrub pa ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bgyi /
analyzed: ji ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mngon par sgrub pa ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bgyi /
translated: How should one practise the perfection of wisdom because the noble truths are not something to be accomplished?

original: ji ltar bsam gtan rnams mngon par sgrub pa ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bgyi /
analyzed: ji ltar bsam gtan rnams mngon par sgrub pa ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bgyi /

translated: How should one practise the perfection of wisdom because the immeasurables are not something to be accomplished? How should one practise the perfection of wisdom because the formless absorptions are not something to be accomplished?

analyzed: ji ltar rnam par thar pa rnams mngon par sgrub pa ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bgyi / ji ltar mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams @255a *//
translated: How should the perfection of wisdom be made to appear because of the non-establishment of the deliverances?

translated: How should the perfection of wisdom be made to appear because of the non-establishment of the emptiness, signless, and wishless doors of liberation?

analyzed: ji ltar mngon par shes pa rnams mngon par sgrub pa ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bgyi /

analyzed: ji ltar ting nge 'dzin rnams mngon par sgrub pa ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bgyi /
translated: How should they accomplish the perfection of wisdom because the meditative stabilities are not accomplished?

original: ji ltar gzungs kyi sgo rnams mngon par sgrub pa ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bgyi /
analyzed: ji ltar gzungs kyi sgo rnams mngon par sgrub pa ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bgyi /
translated: How should they accomplish the perfection of wisdom because the dhāraṇī gateways are not accomplished?

original: ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu mngon par sgrub pa ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bgyi /🔽ji ltar mi 'jigs pa bzhi mngon par sgrub pa ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bgyi /
analyzed: ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu mngon par sgrub pa ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bgyi / ji ltar mi 'jigs pa bzhi mngon par sgrub pa ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bgyi /
translated: How should they accomplish the perfection of wisdom because the ten tathāgata powers are not accomplished?🔽How should they accomplish the perfection of wisdom because the four fearlessnesses are not accomplished?

analyzed: ji ltar so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi mngon par sgrub pa ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bgyi /
translated: How should they accomplish the perfection of wisdom because the four detailed and thorough knowledges are not accomplished?

original: ji ltar snying rje chen po mngon par sgrub pa ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi @255b pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bgyi /
analyzed: ji ltar snying rje chen po mngon par sgrub pa ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi @255b pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bgyi /
translated: How should they accomplish the perfection of wisdom because the accomplishment of great compassion does not exist?

original: ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mngon par sgrub pa ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bgyi /🔽ji ltar rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon par sgrub pa ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bgyi /
analyzed: ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mngon par sgrub pa ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bgyi / ji ltar rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon par sgrub pa ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bgyi /
translated: How should they accomplish the perfection of wisdom because the accomplishment of the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha does not exist?🔽How should they accomplish the perfection of wisdom because the accomplishment of the result of stream enterer does not exist?

original: ji ltar lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon par sgrub pa ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bgyi /
analyzed: ji ltar lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon par sgrub pa ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bgyi /
translated: How should they accomplish the perfection of wisdom because the accomplishment of the result of once-returner does not exist?

original: ji ltar phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon par sgrub pa ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bgyi /🔽ji ltar dgra bcom pa nyid mngon par sgrub pa ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bgyi /
analyzed: ji ltar phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon par sgrub pa ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bgyi / ji ltar dgra bcom pa nyid mngon par sgrub pa ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bgyi /
translated: How should the perfection of wisdom be made into a perfection because of the non-establishment of the fruit of non-returner?🔽How should the perfection of wisdom be made into a perfection because of the non-establishment of the state of a worthy one?

original: ji ltar rang byang chub mngon par sgrub pa ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bgyi /
analyzed: ji ltar rang byang chub mngon par sgrub pa ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bgyi /
translated: How should the perfection of wisdom be made into a perfection because of the non-establishment of a pratyekabuddha’s awakening?

original: ji ltar lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid mngon par sgrub pa ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bgyi /
analyzed: ji ltar lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid mngon par sgrub pa ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bgyi /
translated: How should the perfection of wisdom be made into a perfection because of the non-establishment of the knowledge of path aspects?

original: ji ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mngon par sgrub pa ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bgyi /
analyzed: ji ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mngon par sgrub pa ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bgyi /
translated: How should the perfection of wisdom be made into a perfection because of the non-establishment of the knowledge of all aspects?

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /🔽gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba med @256a *//
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa / gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba med @256a *//
translated: The Blessed One replied:

original: pas; shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //🔽gzugs skye ba med pas /🔽shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o; ;gzugs 'gag pa med pas /
analyzed: pas; shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o // gzugs skye ba med pas / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o; ;gzugs 'gag pa med pas /
translated: “Subhūti, the perfection of wisdom should be accomplished by the non-production of form.🔽The perfection of wisdom should be accomplished by the non-arising of form.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //🔽gzugs dmigs pa med pas /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o // gzugs dmigs pa med pas /
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be accomplished by the non-cessation of form.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //🔽gzugs 'jig pa med pas /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o // gzugs 'jig pa med pas /
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be accomplished by the non-apprehension of form.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //🔽tshor ba mngon par 'du bya ba med pas /🔽shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o // tshor ba mngon par 'du bya ba med pas / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be accomplished by the non-destruction of form.🔽The perfection of wisdom should be accomplished by the non-production of feeling.

original: tshor ba skye ba med pas /🔽shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: tshor ba skye ba med pas / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //
